name: Detour (itch) (Dustyroom)
description:
< Made in 72 hours for #LDJam50 >

Objective

Don’t let the Cube walk on flags. Let it go around as long as possible.

How to play
  • Click on the card on the bottom of the screen [Left Mouse Click]
  • Rotate the shape if needed [Spacebar]
  • Place the shape completely on the blue path [Left Mouse Click]
  • To put back the picked card, press [Esc]
  • Pause [P]
Misc
  • Once the Cube steps on the ‘+’ tile, you get the bonuses:
    • A shape card
    • Shuffle — changes all the cards
    • x2 - duplicates the cards

Rate the game here: https://ldj.am/$281189

Authors 🇺🇦
  • Art: Volodymyr Dzitsiuk
  • Code: Max Dzitsiuk and Oleksandr Lysak
🇺🇦 Please donate below, all proceeds are going to help the fight Ukraine
